FuncDef: The display mac-address aging-time vlan command displays the aging time of MAC address entries.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the aging time of dynamic MAC address entries with the start VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Displays the aging time of dynamic MAC address entries with the end VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run this command to check the aging time of MAC addresses.
Precautions
If MAC address entries do not age, the aging time is displayed as 0 seconds.
If the aging time of MAC address entries in a VLAN is set, the aging time configured in the VLAN takes effect.
If the aging time of MAC address entries in a VLAN is not set, the global aging time of MAC address entries takes effect.
